ingredients.ingredient: 1 (12 fluid ounce) can or bottle lemon-lime flavored carbonated beverage
1 lemon - cut into wedges, for garnish

cookingTips: Chill the glass before pouring to keep the drink cold longer
Shake with ice to chill and slightly dilute, creating a balanced drink
The Blue Curacao adds color and subtle orange note to complement the citrus
enrichment.coachingPrompt: This vibrant cocktail is about balancing citrus flavors with the right proportions. Guide users on proper shaking technique, why chilling glassware matters, and how the blue liqueur complements rather than overpowers the citrus elements.
